65). Two studies in Africa (Ghana and the United Republic of Tanzania) are currently 
evaluating the effect of home visits for newborn care on newborn mortality.
The intervention in all five CRCTs included at least two home visits by female CHWs in the 
first week after birth (on day 1 and day 3). At these home visits, CHWs promoted optimal 
newborn care practices such as early initiation of EBF, keeping the baby warm, hygienic
